channel.title: 2025-01-30s on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 2025-01-30s on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Critique Fine-Tuning: Learning to Critique is More Effective than Learning to Imitate
item.description: Critique Fine-Tuning (CFT) outperforms traditional supervised fine-tuning (SFT) in training language models, achieving comparable results with significantly less data and opening new avenues in AI.

item.title: Early External Safety Testing of OpenAI's o3-mini: Insights from the Pre-Deployment Evaluation
item.description: Researchers used ASTRAL to systematically test OpenAI’s 03-mini LLM’s safety, revealing key vulnerabilities and highlighting the need for continuous, robust safety mechanisms in large language models.

item.title: Virus: Harmful Fine-tuning Attack for Large Language Models Bypassing Guardrail Moderation
item.description: Virus: A new attack method easily bypasses LLM guardrails, highlighting the inadequacy of current safety measures and urging for more robust solutions.

item.title: Atla Selene Mini: A General Purpose Evaluation Model
item.description: Atla Selene Mini: A state-of-the-art small LLM judge surpassing larger models in benchmark performance!
